meta.title: Valley View ISD - Covid-19 meal pickup

li.a: Valley View High School Alumni Association

strong.class: hidden-xs visible-sm visible-md visible-lg visible-xl pull-left site_sub_title
text-center visible-xs hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg hidden-xl site_sub_title

div.class: custom_144330 content-color well img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated 0

span.span: Meal distribution days have changed to limit contact between staff and parents. Beginning April 13, 2020 meals will be distributed on Mondays and Thursdays only. Monday’s distribution will included meals for Monday through Wednesday. Thursday’s distribution will include meals for Thursday and Friday.

VVISD will be providing a curb-side lunch/breakfast pickup program beginning Wednesday, March 25th. Pickup will be available from 12:00 noon to 1:00 p.m. in the parking area on the north side of the gym. Please contact your child’s school on Monday if possible to let them know if you plan to participate.
Thanks to everyone for your patience during this challenging time. We are making every effort to continue to meet the needs of our students and community.

div.br:
106 Newton St.
Valley View, TX, Texas 76272
